ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu! wiki repository has seen significant activity with multiple pull requests focused on updating event listings, including the addition of the ANZT6W tournament article, and the update of the MWC 7K 2025 team listing. These changes aim to improve the accuracy and comprehensiveness of the wiki, with contributors also discussing plans to document additional tournaments in the future.

ppy/osu.summary: The osu! repository has experienced substantial activity with several pull requests addressing various aspects of the game. Notably, additions include the basic difficulty and performance calculation for the Autopilot mod on the osu! ruleset, as well as osu!taiko-specific changes such as rhythm consideration, star rating and performance points rebalance, and stamina balancing. These updates aim to enhance gameplay and provide a more refined experience for players.

ppy/osu-web.summary: The osu-web repository has seen a pull request to replace ts-loader and terser with swc, aiming to streamline and optimize the development process. This change potentially improves the efficiency and performance of the web application.

ppy/SDL3-CS.summary: The SDL3-CS repository has a pull request focused on updating bindings, incorporating pen support for iOS and Android, and removing unnecessary files. This update aligns with broader SDL developments and prepares for future integration with osu!framework.
